text: Pad Idan Jn railway station (, ) is located in Padidan town, Naushahro Feroze district of Sindh province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Naushahro Feroze District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Pad Idan Junction railway station
